price: Regarde comme ils inventent le mensonge à l’encontre d’Allah. Et ça, c’est assez comme péché manifeste!
arabic: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ يَفۡتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَۖ وَكَفَىٰ بِهِۦٓ إِثۡمٗا مُّبِينًا

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: unẓur kayfa yaftarūna ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba wakafā bihi ith'man mubīnan
